ComicInfo.Summary:
It all comes down to this: Twilight Command has its back against the wall, but they refuse to relent. They can’t—not when Cavil’s army of toasters is ready to swarm New Caprica. Prepare yourself for an explosive—and shocking—finale!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Brent Schoonover | 1 | B | Cover B | Breno Tamura | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Breno Tamura | 4 | E/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover | 5 |
